examples.example: 我出门通常会选择打车，这样既方便又快捷。

translate.english: I usually choose to take a taxi when going out, which is both convenient and fast.

examples.example: 今天下雨了，我打车去上班，避免了被雨淋湿。

translate.english: It rained today, and I took a taxi to work to avoid getting wet by the rain.

examples.example: 每次下班很晚时，我就会选择打车回家，这样既安全又能早点到家休息。

translate.english: Every time when I get off work very late, I will choose to take a taxi home, which is both safe and able to get home and rest earlier.
